overview:
Kirit Sarvaiya is an innovator. Currently, he heads the product management group that focuses on marketing systems at Guitar Center.

Prior to Guitar Center, he ran his own firm, Malabar Hill Ventures, with clients such as McKinsey, Fox Interactive Media, eBay, and TouchCommerce. He has also worked at well-known companies such as Microsoft, Yahoo!, MySpace, and MTV Interactive, to name a few.

Kirit holds an Executive MBA from the University of Southern California, and a Bachelors in Engineering from Stevens Institute of Technology.
